descriptionHtml:
thing changed
one-handed 100  and all perks unlocked
two-handed 100  and all perks unlocked
block          100  and all perks unlocked
archery       100  and all perks unlocked
and everything else is set to 100 but perks not unlocked
she can never die (if you try to kill her she will only get on her knees and get up again)
steel plate armor
elven sword, bow, arrow
fus ro dah shout
disarm shout
storm call shout
author: samir jusufovic
